roleOverview: Software Engineers design, build, test, and maintain applications used by businesses and consumers across web, mobile, and cloud platforms.
beginnerStage: Learn programming fundamentals and one language deeply
Build small projects like to-do app, API service, and portfolio site
Practice problem solving with coding exercises
intermediateStage: Develop full-stack projects with authentication and database integration
Learn system design basics, CI/CD, and cloud deployment
Contribute to open source or internships for production experience
advancedStage: Specialize in backend, frontend, mobile, or AI engineering
Lead architecture decisions and performance optimization initiatives
Mentor junior developers and drive engineering best practices
realWorldProjects: Realtime collaboration tool with WebSocket support
Scalable REST/GraphQL API with caching and monitoring
salaryInsights: Entry-level software roles often start with competitive pay and scale significantly with strong system design and product impact.
